youtube.title: Pregnancy Time-lapse: Week 1 to 40 Baby Development
youtube.description: Experience the complete 40-week journey of human pregnancy in this detailed visual animation. See how a baby grows and how the mother's body changes week by week. Perfect for biology students and expecting parents!
